dynamic-element.name: text
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
You may upload entire bibliographies or clone bibliographies already present on BibShare.
You can can augment your bibliography either by using references already present on the BibShare platform or by adding new references.

dynamic-element.name: section
text
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: If you use a reference in multiple bibliographies references with the same BibTeX key or with the same bibref-id are updated automatically across all your bibliographies.
What happens, if I use a reference in multiple bibliograpies?
